events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your software development background.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process for the Engineer role.
The initial screening call went well, and your experience with software engineering aligns with our team's needs.
Thank you for the initial screening. I am very enthusiastic about the opportunity and look forward to the next steps.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 16th at 2 PM UTC. Prepare to discuss your software engineering projects.
